QueryResult.text: SELECT s.id id, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(a.prestsum,0))/3600 FROM PRASSIGNMENT a, PRTASK t, SRM_RESOURCES r WHERE a.prtaskid = t.prid AND t.prprojectid = s.id AND a.prresourceid = r.id AND a.prestsum is not null AND a.prestsum > 0 AND r.resource_type = 0),0) estsum FROM INV_INVESTMENTS s
